name: 22/23 Y1C - Team 1 (Baer) - Potato Jumper
description:
-- Potato Jumper --
CONTROLLER ONLY

This is a project made by first year game design students of Breda University of Applied Sciences

In this game you control a potato that has to escape a sewers environment. You will be required to dash and jump in order to avoid the hazards. We were aiming for a player experience of Rhythmic, Timing and Soft Failure.
